words.def: (criminal law) an act punishable by law
any of numerous small rodents typically resembling diminutive rats having pointed snouts and small ears on elongated bodies with slender usually hairless tails
A mercenary.
Of or pertaining to the analysis of a cultural system or its features from the perspective of a participant in that culture.
ice crystals forming a white deposit (especially on objects outside)
grains used as food either unpolished or more often polished
a soft wet area of low-lying land that sinks underfoot
an independent ruler or chieftain (especially in Africa or Arabia)
Microphone.
County/City (Proper noun)
a recurring sleep state during which dreaming occurs
the shape of a raised edge of a more or less circular object
A recommendation or suggestion.
A Russian village community.
water frozen in the solid state
An old Portuguese money of account .
a strong emotion
destruction of heart tissue resulting from obstruction of the blood supply to the heart muscle
a state in New England
a quad with a square body
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
